hadiths.text: Narrated Umm Salamah: "The Prophet (ﷺ) slackened Fatimah's garment a hand-span." [Abu 'Eisa said:] Some of them reported it from Hammad bin Salamah, from 'Ali bin Zaid, from Al-Hasan, from his father, from Umm Salamah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي جَرِّ ذُيُولِ النِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About (Dragging) Women's Hems
